snippet: The move, which regulators may announce by Wednesday, would more than double the size of the largest safety recall in automotive history.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Admin will announce that minimum of 35 million more Takata airbags need to be fixed, finding that would more than double largest recall of automobiles in United States history.
lead_paragraph: The move, which regulators may announce by Wednesday, would more than double the size of the largest safety recall in automotive history.

headline.main: Takata Airbag Recall Is Said to Grow by 35 Million
headline.print_headline: Takata Airbag Recall Is Said to Double, Expanding by 35 Million
